General.Name: Noble Corporation plc
General.Description: Noble Corporation plc operates as an offshore drilling contractor for the oil and gas industry worldwide. The company provides contract drilling services to the oil and gas industry through its fleet of mobile offshore drilling units. It operates drilling rigs consisting of floaters and jackups. Noble Corporation plc was founded in 1921 and is headquartered in Sugar Land, Texas.
